extension.summary: A simple all-around Maintenance Tool for PSMC and Kodi
extension.description: PSMC's Maintenance helps to aid with a much smoother PSMC or Kodi experience without all the fluff. Features include: Auto delete of cache at start up, notify when packages and thumbs reach a set amount of wasted storage space, cuts down on your devices read/writes on the ROM. Backup/Restore Options, speed test, and other features![CR][CR]If you would like to show your appreciation for the time and efforts I put into these projects, please buy me a [B][COLOR deepskyblue]"cup of coffee"[/COLOR][/B] by scanning the QR code or visiting [COLOR deepskyblue]bit.ly/3Lb5nd5[/COLOR]. [CR][CR][COLOR limegreen](Generosity like yours is rare to find these days. I thank you in advance for your support. I am very grateful for EVERY donation and truly appreciate your kindness!)[/COLOR][COLOR skyblue] â€¢ The Papaw[/COLOR]
extension.news: If you would like to show your appreciation for the time and efforts I put into these projects, please buy me [B][COLOR deepskyblue]"a cup of coffee"[/COLOR][/B] by scanning the QR code or visiting [COLOR deepskyblue]bit.ly/3Lb5nd5[/COLOR].[CR][CR][COLOR gold]Latest Update:[/COLOR][CR]v1.1.2[CR] - Added Support QR Code

extension.description: TMDb Helper liefert Details über Filme, Fernsehsendungen und Schauspieler aus TMDb. Benutzer können auf eine Vielzahl von Listen aus TMDb TVDb MDbList und Trakt zugreifen.
TMDb Helper provides details about movies, tvshows and actors from TMDb. Users can access a variety of lists from TMDb TVDb MDbList and Trakt.
TMDb Helper dostarcza szczegółowych informacji o filmach, serialach i aktorach z serwisu TMDb. Użytkownicy mają dostęp do szeregu list z serwisów TMDb, TVDb, MDbList i Trakt.
TMDb Helper tillhandahåller information om filmer, tv-serier och skådespelare från TMDb. Användare kan få tillgång till en mängd olika listor från TMDb, TVDb, MDbList och Trakt.
TMDb 助手从 TMDb（影视数据库） 获取电影、电视剧及演员的详细信息。用户可访问来自 TMDb、TVDb、MDbList 和 Trakt 的各类影视列表。
extension.disclaimer: Daten bereitgestellt von TMDb TVDb MDbList OMDb FanartTV und Trakt. Einige der Informationen werden von TheTVDB.com bereitgestellt. Bitte erwäge sie zu unterstützen. https://thetvdb.com/subscribe
Data provided by TMDb TVDb MDbList OMDb FanartTV and Trakt. Some of the information is provided by TheTVDB.com. Please consider supporting them. https://thetvdb.com/subscribe
Dane dostarczane przez TMDb TVDb MDbList OMDb FanartTV i Trakt. Niektóre informacje pochodzą z serwisu TheTVDB.com. Prosimy o rozważenie wsparcia tych serwisów. https://thetvdb.com/subscribe
Data tillhandahållen av TMDb TVDb MDbList OMDb FanartTV och Trakt. En del av informationen tillhandahålls av TheTVDB.com. Stöd dem gärna. https://thetvdb.com/subscribe
数据由 TMDb、TVDb、MDbList、OMDb、FanartTV 和 Trakt 提供。部分信息由 TheTVDB.com 提供，建议您支持他们。订阅链接：https://thetvdb.com/subscribe

extension.description: YouTube е един от най-големите уеб сайтове за споделяне на видео в целия свят.
YouTube je jedna z největších webových stránek světa sdílející video.
YouTube er et af verdens største videodelingswebsteder.
YouTube ist eines der größten Video-Sharing-Websites der Welt.
Το YouTube είναι μία από τις μεγαλύτερες ιστοσελίδες διαμοιρασμού βίντεο στον κόσμο.
YouTube is one of the biggest video-sharing websites of the world.
YouTube es uno de los sitios web para compartir vídeos más grandes del mundo.
YouTube es uno de los más grandes sitios web de intercambio de videos del mundo.
YouTube on yksi maailman suurimmista videoiden jakosivustoista.
YouTube est l'un des plus grands sites de partage vidéos du monde.
YouTube הוא אחד מאתרי שיתוף הווידאו הגדולים בעולם.
YouTube je jedna od najvećih stranica za dijeljenje video sadržaja na svijetu.
A YouTube világ egyik legnagyobb videómegosztó weboldala.
YouTube adalah salah satu situs web berbagi video terbesar di dunia.
YouTube è uno dei più grandi siti di condivisione video del mondo.
유튜브는 세상에서 가장 큰 동영상 공유 사이트 중의 하나입니다.
YouTube er en av verdens største nettsider for videodeling.
YouTube is een van de grootste videodelenwebsite in de hele wereld.
YouTube jest jednym z największych na świecie serwisów udostępniania wideo.
O YouTube é um dos maiores sites de compartilhamento de vídeos do mundo.
YouTube este unul dintre cele mai mari saituri de distribuire de videoclipuri din lume.
YouTube - популярнейший видеохостинговый сайт, предоставляющий пользователям услуги хранения, доставки и показа видео.
YouTube je jednou z najväčších stránok na zdieľanie videa na svete.
YouTube är en av de största videodelningssajterna i världen.
YouTube, dünya üzerindeki en büyük video paylaşma platformlarından birisidir.
YouTube є одним з найбільших відеохостингів в світі.
YouTube là một trong những trang web chia sẻ video lớn nhất trên thế giới.
油管是世界上最大的视频分享网站之一。
Youtube 是全世界最大的影片分享網站。

Ovaj dodatak nije podržan od strane Googlea

이 플러그인은 Google의 허가를 받지 않았습니다
Deze plug-in wordt niet door Google ondersteund
Ta wtyczka nie jest zatwierdzona przez Google
Este plugin não é recomendado pelo Google
Acest modul nu este susținut de Google
Плагин не поддерживается Google

Detta plugin är inte godkänt av Google

extension.description: Common code required by TMDbHelper and other related jurialmunkey add-ons

extension.summary: Downloads Artwork for TV shows, Movies and Music videos for addons and stores them in a local SQLITE database
extension.description: Queries, stores, and returns metadata for TV shows, Movies and Musicvideos. [CR]Sources:[CR]www.thetvdb.com[CR]www.themoviedb.org[CR]www.imdb.com[CR]www.omdbapi.com[CR]This product uses the TMDb API but is not endorsed or certified by TMDb.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 2, June 1991
extension.news: [B]Version 5.0.1[/B] - Fixed settings.xml version preventing setting UI from showing in Kodiunder Matrix

extension.summary: Resolve common video host URL's to be playable in XBMC/Kodi.
Resolver enlaces a videos de sitios populares para poder reproducirlos en XBMC/Kodi.
Prilagodi najčešće URL-ove video izvora kako bi radili u XBMC/Kodiju.
Επίλυση συνδέσμων κοινών εξυπηρετητών σε μορφή βίντεο ικανό για αναπαραγωγή στο XBMC/Kodi.
extension.description: Resolve common video host URL's to be playable in XBMC/Kodi, simplify addon development of video plugins requiring multi video hosts.
Επίλυση συνδέσμων κοινών εξυπηρετητών σε μορφή βίντεο ικανό για αναπαραγωγή στο XBMC/Kodi, απλοποίηση της ανάπτυξης των προσθέτων που χρησιμοποιούν πολλαπλούς εξυπηρετητές για υλικό βίντεο
Prilagodi najčešće URL-ove video izvora kako bi radili u XBMC/Kodiju, pojednostavnjuje razvoj priključaka za video dodatke koji zahtjevaju višestruke video izvore.
extension.disclaimer: This script only resolves video content from legitimate file lockers without prejudice. If this script is being used by 3rd parties to resolve content that you feel infringes upon your Intellectual Property then please take your complaints to the actual website or developer linking to such content and not here. This script in no way searches for any content whatsoever.

Το ανωτέρο σενάριο το μόνο που κάνει είναι να επιλύει οπτικοακουστικό περιεχόμενο από νόμιμες πηγές χωρίς προκατάληψη. Εάν το ανωτέρο σενάριο χρησιμοποιηθεί από τρίτους ώστε να επιλύσει περιεχόμενο το οποίο σας προκαλεί αντίδραση ότι παραβιάζει την πνευματική σας ιδιοκτησία παρακαλώ μεταφέρετε τα παραπονά σας στον ιστότοπο τον οποίο βρίσκεται το εν λόγω περιεχόμενο η τον δημιουργό ο οποίος πραγματοποιεί την σύνδεση και όχι εδω. Το σενάριο αυτό ουδεμία περίπτωση πραγματοποιεί αναζήτηση περιεχομένου.

extension.summary: Launches LaunchBox in Big Box mode from within PSMC.
extension.disclaimer: For bugs, requests or general questions visit the PSMC-21 Repository on GitHub.
extension.description: Launches Big Box from within PSMC - It will close or minimize PSMC and when Big Box is exited, PSMC will restart or maximize. Also has options to run programs pre or post BigBox. It works with PSMC or Kodi on Windows platform ONLY.[CR][CR]If you would like to show your appreciation for the time and efforts I put into these projects, please scan the "Coffee Cup" (QC code) above and buy me a cup of coffee or subscribe for access to "What's Next" and all future updates. [COLOR limegreen] (Generosity like yours is rare to find these days. I thank you in advance for your support. I am very grateful for your donation and truly appreciate your kindness!)[/COLOR][COLOR skyblue] â€¢ The Papaw[/COLOR]
extension.news: added Support QR code

If you would like to show your appreciation for the time and efforts I put into these projects, please buy me [B][COLOR deepskyblue]"a cup of coffee"[/COLOR][/B] by scanning the QR code or visiting [COLOR deepskyblue]bit.ly/3Lb5nd5[/COLOR].[CR][CR][COLOR gold]Latest Update:[/COLOR][CR]v1.4.3[CR] - updated screenshots
extension.summary: Papaw's AZR Redux is gebaseerd op de originele Arctic Zephyr-skin gemaakt door jurialmunkey. Papaw's AZR Redux gaat over eenvoudig, strak, minimalistisch en uiterst aanpasbaar.
Papaw's AZR Redux is based on the original Arctic Zephyr skin created by jurialmunkey. Papaw's AZR Redux is about being simple, clean, minimalistic and extremely customizable.
Papaw's AZR Redux is based on the original Arctic Zephyr skin created by jurialmunkey. Papaw's AZR Redux is about being simple, clean, minimalistic and extremely customizable.
Papaw's AZR Redux is based on the original Arctic Zephyr skin created by jurialmunkey. Papaw's AZR Redux is about being simple, clean, minimalistic and extremely customizable.
AZR Redux de Papaw se basa en el aspecto original de Arctic Zephyr creado por jurialmunkey. AZR Redux de Papaw se trata de ser simple, limpio, minimalista y extremadamente personalizable.
L'AZR Redux de Papaw est basé sur le skin original Arctic Zephyr créé par jurialmunkey. AZR Redux de Papaw se veut simple, propre, minimaliste et extrêmement personnalisable.
L'AZR Redux de Papaw est basé sur le skin original Arctic Zephyr créé par jurialmunkey. AZR Redux de Papaw se veut simple, propre, minimaliste et extrêmement personnalisable.
Papaw's AZR Redux sukurtas remiantis originalia Arctic Zephyr oda, kurią sukūrė jurialmunkey. Papaw AZR Redux yra paprastas, švarus, minimalistinis ir labai pritaikomas.
Papaw's AZR Redux is gebaseerd op de originele Arctic Zephyr-skin gemaakt door jurialmunkey. Papaw's AZR Redux gaat over eenvoudig, strak, minimalistisch en uiterst aanpasbaar.
Papaw's AZR Redux opiera się na oryginalnej skórce Arctic Zephyr stworzonej przez Jurialmunkey. Papaw's AZR Redux ma być prosty, czysty, minimalistyczny i niezwykle konfigurowalny.
Papaw's AZR Redux se bazează pe pielea originală Arctic Zephyr creată de jurialmunkey. Papaw's AZR Redux este despre a fi simplu, curat, minimalist și extrem de personalizabil.
AZR Redux от Papaw основан на оригинальном скине Arctic Zephyr, созданном jurialmunkey. AZR Redux от Papaw — простой, понятный, минималистичный и чрезвычайно настраиваемый.
extension.description: [CR]Als je je waardering wilt tonen voor de tijd en moeite die ik in deze projecten heb gestoken, scan dan het "Koffiekopje" (QR-code) hierboven en koop [COLOR deepskyblue]een kopje koffie[/COLOR] of bezoek [COLOR deepskyblue]bit.ly/3Lb5nd5[/COLOR] om je te abonneren voor toegang tot "What's Next" en alle toekomstige updates.[CR][CR][COLOR limegreen]Vrijgevigheid zoals die van jou is tegenwoordig zeldzaam. Ik dank u bij voorbaat voor uw steun. Ik ben erg dankbaar voor ELKE donatie en waardeer je vriendelijkheid enorm![/COLOR][COLOR hemelsblauw] • De Papaja[/COLOR]

It includes [COLOR FFFFFF00]Home Screen Animations[/COLOR] [I][COLOR FFE67300] (can be toggled Off in the settings).[/COLOR][/I]. Double widgets and Lots of features and views to choose from.

extension.summary: [COLOR FFFFFF00]COMPLETELEY[/COLOR] redesigned. Skin updated and modded. Added home screen animation [I][COLOR FFE67300]{can be disabled in settings}[/COLOR][/I], new features and views.
extension.description: [COLOR FFFFFF00]COMPLETELEY[/COLOR] redesigned. Skin updated and modded. Added home screen animation [COLOR FFE67300] which can be disabled in settings[/COLOR], new features and views. Created for use with PSMC [I]{a Kodi fork}[/I]. Please give credit to Mike, The Papaw and all others that have contributed.[I][COLOR FFE67300] You will need to enable the Toy Story GUI SOUNDS in the System Settings if you wish to use them.[/COLOR][/I] [I](themed from AeonNoxSilvo)[/I]
extension.news: [B][I][COLOR FFFFFF00]Skin updated, modded and Completely Redesigned[/COLOR][/I][/B][CR][COLOR FF00D5FF]- Added NEW Home Screen Animation[/COLOR][CR][COLOR FF00D5FF]- Additional Falling Seasons[/COLOR][CR][COLOR FFE67300]Included with v7.9.4 Silvo update by Mike[/COLOR][CR]- Fix Live TV OSD button focus when unable to pause[CR]- Fixes to DialogSelect[CR]- Fix no items in Ask Default Background selection on new installs[CR]- Drop Skin Helper Widgets for favorites and use favourites:// path instead[CR]- Update and add some missing icons[CR]- Fix Netherlands rating classification images[CR]- Update and re-design PVR Group Manager[CR]- Fix Menu resetting to defaults[CR]- Add TMDb search from DialogVideoInfo Extras on Home screen[CR]- Fix missing icon/poster in SlimList[CR]- PVR updates and additions[CR]- Updated language files from Transifex[CR]- Revert removal of bottom OSD button position[CR]- Add option to use Skin Info Service for Movie Set Plots in Video Info[CR]- Fix default letter jump appearing on side menu settings button focus[CR]- Add "fixed" option for video RightList[CR]- Tweak Vertical Menu fixed behaviour to match Horizontal[CR]- Rework Live TV guide with icons from Estuary and re-add channel logos[CR]- Add disable to submenu items in Main Menu Customizer[CR]- Add information setting to SlimList[CR]- Remove script.extendedinfo and add script.embuary.info support[CR]- Add DialogVideoInfo for sets[CR]- Add some v19 skin engine changes[CR]- Use script.embuary.helper for Similiar and Directer movies in DialogVideoInfo[CR]- Add missing PVR label to Widget info[CR]- Add Glow Bars and System Glow Bars to color customizer[CR]- Add Jump to Letter bar to Video library using script.embuary.helper[CR]- Fix playlist backgrounds for Main Menu not following user set rotation speed[CR]- Redesign DialogExtendedProgressBar and DialogVolumeBar[CR]- Make OSD buttons on top default and remove option[CR]- Redesign PlayerProcessInfo[CR]- Clean up Main Menu and Widget Customizers[CR]- Fill empty space with more info in some views[CR][CR][B]All updates may contain various changes and/or improvements[/B][CR][I][COLOR FFFF0202]Please give credit to all the devolopers (Especially Mike) that has shared most of these changes. Also all others that have and do contribute to this skin![/COLOR][/I]
